branding.tagline: Sunburst charts are a visually appealing way to showcase hierarchical data structures.

VIZ_LABEL.label: Visualization Label
VIZ_LABEL.description: This label will appear in the visualization selector in the Looker Explore UI.

VIZ_ID.label: Visualization ID
VIZ_ID.description: This ID must be unique across all custom visualizations on your instance.
